snippet: A woman who was deputy chief of staff to Scott Walker when he was the Milwaukee County executive pleaded guilty to a charge that she worked as a fund-raiser on government time.
abstract: Kelly M Rindfleisch, former top aide to Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker, pleads guilty to one count of felony misconduct in public office for fund-raising on government time.
lead_paragraph: A woman who was deputy chief of staff to Scott Walker when he was the Milwaukee County executive pleaded guilty to a charge that she worked as a fund-raiser on government time.

headline.seo: Former Aide to Gov. Scott Walker Pleads Guilty
headline.main: Ex-Aide to Governor Walker Pleads Guilty in Wisconsin
